propositions.text: The document is titled '（古代重生）重生之尽风流---似是故人来'.
The document contains a prologue labeled '楔子'.
The prologue describes a sentiment of '风流倜傥，快意恩仇'.
The document contains a chapter labeled '第一章'.
Chapter 1 begins with a quote: '既见君子，乐且有仪。'
A descriptive sentence follows: '风儿轻轻地吹过，带走了夏日炎炎的燥热。'
A numbered list is presented under section '1.2'.
The first item in the list is '第一点。'
The second item in the list is '第二点。'
The third item in the list is '第三点。'
A multi-line quote is presented: '故人西辞黄鹤楼，烟花三月下扬州。孤帆远影碧空尽，唯见长江天际流。'
A Python code block is included: 'def hello_world(): print("Hello, world!")'.
A section labeled '1.3' follows, containing a repetition of the document title.
